channel.title: Aws on Tech ramblings by Marcin
channel.description: Recent content in Aws on Tech ramblings by Marcin

item.title: Get to your AWS host with ease
item.description: If you deploy to cloud, ideally you should be able to analyze and debug your system using observability tools. There should be no need to log in to your hosts directly. But life is life, and there might be issues with this or that, and to debug them, direct access to a host is just much easier. Instead of doing a long sequence of clicks through your WebUI in AWS console, you can also access your host with a script.
